card.name: Abzan Battle Priest
card.text: Outlast {W} ({W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.) Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has lifelink.

card.text: Outlast {W} ({W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.) Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has flying.

card.text: Destroy target creature with flying. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Aetherize
card.text: Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.

card.name: Aether Vial
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Aether Vial. {T}: You may put a creature card with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Aether Vial from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Ainok Bond-Kin

card.name: Amass the Components

card.name: Angelic Accord
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, if you gained 4 or more life this turn, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

card.name: Angel of Mercy
card.text: Flying When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Anger of the Gods
card.text: Anger of the Gods deals 3 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Palladium Myr
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Path of Bravery
card.text: As long as your life total is greater than or equal to your starting life total, creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever one or more creatures you control attack, you gain life equal to the number of attacking creatures.

card.name: Pentarch Ward
card.text: Enchant creature As Pentarch Ward enters the battlefield, choose a color. When Pentarch Ward enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has protection from the chosen color. This effect doesn't remove Pentarch Ward.

card.name: Phantom Tiger

card.text: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Pillar of Flame
card.text: Pillar of Flame deals 2 damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. You gain 1 life.

card.text: {T}: Prodigal Pyromancer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.text: Return target nonland permanent with converted mana cost X to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Restoration Angel

card.name: Rift Bolt

At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.text: {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. If you played a land this turn, add {B} to your mana pool instead.

card.name: Sandstone Oracle

When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)
